item.title: links for 2009-03-03
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• tip: Temporary instances with automatic shutdown - ec2ubuntu | Google Groups
    Launch temporary EC2 instances by starting them with a shutdown parameter to terminate after X minutes.
    (tags: configuration ec2 amazon)
  • Amazon Web Services Developer Community : ec2-upload-bundle (30354) not working ...
    For the EC2 Error: Error talking to S3: Server.SignatureDoesNotMatch(403): The request signature we calculated does not match the signature you provided. Check your key and signing method. All that was needed to fix it was to make sure your S3 bucket didn't have any capitals in it.
    (tags: configuration tips ec2 amazon aws)
